Sql.query: SELECT * FROM CAM_FORMATOD1CDET WHERE FORMATOD1CCODI = :FORMATOD1CCODI AND IND_DEL = :IND_DEL ORDER BY FORMATOD1CDETCODI DESC

INSERT INTO CAM_FORMATOD1CDET ( FORMATOD1CDETCODI, FORMATOD1CCODI, HORA, DEMANDA, GENERACION, USU_CREACION, FEC_CREACION, IND_DEL ) VALUES ( :FORMATOD1CDETCODI, :FORMATOD1CCODI, :HORA, :DEMANDA, :GENERACION, :USU_CREACION, :FEC_CREACION, :IND_DEL )

UPDATE CAM_FORMATOD1CDET SET FORMATOD1CCODI = :FORMATOD1CCODI, HORA = :HORA, DEMANDA = :DEMANDA, GENERACION = :GENERACION, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION, IND_DEL = :IND_DEL, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE FORMATOD1CDETCODI = :FORMATOD1CDETCODI
SELECT * FROM CAM_FORMATOD1CDET ORDER BY FORMATOD1CDETCODI DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

UPDATE CAM_FORMATOD1CDET SET IND_DEL = :IND_DEL, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE FORMATOD1CCODI IN (SELECT FORMATOD1CCODI FROM CAM_FORMATOD1C WHERE PROYCODI = :PROYCODI AND IND_DEL = '0' ) AND IND_DEL = '0'
SELECT * FROM CAM_FORMATOD1CDET WHERE FORMATOD1CDETCODI = :ID AND IND_DEL = :IND_DEL
